languageKey.label: Select the kind of page you want to create. You can see the basic layout in the icon below the selector box.
Select alternative page structure for subpages.

Subpages to this page will normally use the same structure as you have set in the "Page Template Structure" field above. However you can select an alternative structure here to be used by all subpages.
